name: system_admin
description: manages and oversees all operations on the platform.

name: company_admin
description: Manages and oversees all operations within their company on the platform.

name: company_user
description: Regular user within a company, capable of accessing and interacting with company-specific modules.

name: vc_coordinator
description: Coordinates venture capital activities and communications within the platform.

name: bii_anchor
description: Acts as the main point of contact for BII, facilitating communication and management within the platform.

name: bii_comms
description: Handles BII-specific communications and public relations tasks within the platform.

name: coordinator
description: Organizes and ensures smooth operation of various activities within the platform.

name: relationship_manager
description: Maintains and develops relationships with users and stakeholders within the platform.

name: legal_manager
description: Handles legal matters, ensuring compliance and managing legal risks within the platform.

name: finance_manager
description: Manages financial operations and transactions within the platform.

name: facility_manager
description: Oversees the management and maintenance of physical resources and facilities within the platform.

name: novo_impact
description: Facilitates and manages initiatives aimed at creating positive societal impact within the Novo ecosystem.
